Here are the key #ElectionDay dates to know for California:
→ Voter registration must be completed by Oct. 22 (But you can conditionally register through Nov. 6)
→ Vote-by-mail ballot requests must arrive by Oct. 30
→ Election Day is Nov. 6. Polls will be open from 7 am-8 pm
